reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress stunning for engagement photos and appreciate its amazing quality and comfort, with one noting it doesn't feel cheap. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some say it fits amazing, others report issues with the chest area being too big and the dress being too short for their body. Moreover, the cut is criticized for being very low in the chest area, and the zipper quality is poor, with customers reporting issues with it not having holes and being difficult to use. Additionally, the dress is see-through in the back, though it effectively hides the belly. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great boho dress
items.body: Beautiful boho dress, perfect for attending a wedding and a night out. The size ran small, I suggest going up one size. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very classy and beautiful!
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous! The lace is high-quality, and the romper underneath is both comfortable and loose fitting. The neckline is a little low-cut, but still very classy. I’m 5’0” tall and with lower wedges it grazes the floor perfectly. Read more
items.author: Cassiemon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but no on the romper
items.body: 140lbs 5’3” ordered size small. The dress fits beautifully and it seems very well-made. however, I didn’t read that it was a romper, which makes it really difficult to use the bathroom because you have to unzip the entire full length dress. I’ll probably end up return it bc of that. Read more
items.author: C. Loucks

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for tall ladies
items.body: This romper is lovely and good quality.... but it's bit for tall ladies. I'm 5'9 and the waist hits in a weird spot and it rides up the back. I also didn't realize it had a zipper all the way up the back making it too difficult to to get in and out of for every day wear.... unless you dont need the bathroom all day. Read more
items.author: Dorkindisguise

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable, lightweight. Dresses up and down
items.body: The shorts underneath are and excellent touch. Very soft, comfortable in subtropical Florida. I wore this to a Florida Autumn outdoor wedding rehearsal and it was perfect. Washes well. Lightweight upper and soft stretchy under. Under boob seam is not stretchy. Step in only. Read more
items.author: PG198

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you’re over a size 12 - get it!
items.body: Loved this dress for my bridal shower!!! It was so comfy and beautiful Ten out of ten. It was a little long but I just cut the bottom around the scalloped edge. No need to even sew it. It was perfect. I ordered an xxl just to have it not so tight on my waist. But I normally am a 12-14 Read more
items.author: Tiffani June-Yeates

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for summer wedding, with slight modification
items.body: OVERALL SIZE: I am 5'6, 36C and about ~170 and ordered size L, fit was great - not too tight anywhere but not noticeably loose. The lace pattern was really nice for concealing any body shape you're shy about - normally I would wear spanx to squeeze in my belly, but it didn't feel necessary in this outfit. I got lots of compliments and it felt like the right blend of dressy/comfortable for a cocktail attire outdoor wedding. LENGTH: The dress part was floor length, raised up about 1" off the floor when I wore 3" wedges. BUST: The v-neck is DEEP. Went down pretty much right above my navel. I followed other reviewers' lead and ended up stitching up the bottom 5-6" with red thread, until the v was even with my cleavage. This tightened the chest a bit but not uncomfortably. I had trouble finding a bra or even deep-V body suit that would fit this (halter strap would show at the top, back of the dress is see through so most bras were out, and the deep v ruled out the rest), so I ended up using pasties and boob tape to great effect. COMFORT: The material is a little scratchy, but overall not bad. I wore the dress to a summer wedding that was supposed to be outdoors but moved inside due to rain - I was pretty comfortable throughout. The lace lets a little air flow. The romper element makes going to the bathroom a bit difficult, b ut the zipper was doable on my own without help. Read more
items.author: Mackenzie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for summer wedding, with slight modification

I followed other reviewers' lead and ended up stitching up the bottom 5-6" with red thread, until the v was even with my cleavage. This tightened the chest a bit but not uncomfortably. I had trouble finding a bra or even deep-V body suit that would fit this (halter strap would show at the top, back of the dress is see through so most bras were out, and the deep v ruled out the rest), so I ended up using pasties and boob tape to great effect. COMFORT: The material is a little scratchy, but overall not bad. I wore the dress to a summer wedding that was supposed to be outdoors but moved inside due to rain - I was pretty comfortable throughout. The lace lets a little air flow. The romper element makes going to the bathroom a bit difficult, b ut the zipper was doable on my own without help. Read more
items.author: Kourtney Mowrey

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Burnt Orange, Apricot, Sage Green, Black, Dusty Blue, Black-1, Dark Green, Wine Red, Pink, White, White-1, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
